American Citizen Coronavirus Relief Act
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to adjust identification number requirements for taxpayers filing joint returns to receive Economic Impact Payments.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
American Citizen Coronavirus Relief Act
This bill requires taxpayers and their dependent children to include a valid Social Security number on their tax returns in order to receive a 2020 recovery rebate. The bill allows a reduced rebate for taxpayers filing a joint return if one spouse provides a valid number.
